message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product that I know will be incredibly valuable to your business. My asking price is $950,000, which reflects the product's high quality and potential. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a price of $750,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $750,000 is below my minimum acceptable price, I'm willing to compromise. I'm confident this product will be worth far more than this price in the long run. Let's meet in the middle at $850,000. I believe this price is fair and reflects the value you'll gain from this product.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your position and am willing to consider an increased offer. I would like to propose a price of $800,000. This aligns closer to your original asking price while still being within my budget.
